activities: We provide application implementation, administration, and support for IT applications at customer sites.  Some of these applications contain personal information data for EU or Swiss employees of these customers. SPK has access to this information because of our application support role.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: SPK does not have access to manually processed data.  Data includes:  full name, business title, business telephone number, business email address, business office address
